emissions.closest_match_explanation: For '1 kg hakket oksekød', the most appropriate match is 'oksekød, hakket, 10-15% fedt'. This is because the ingredient specifies 'hakket oksekød' (minced beef), and among the minced beef options, 'oksekød, hakket, 10-15% fedt' represents a common fat percentage for minced beef. It is also chosen over 'oksekød, hakket, 5-10% fedt' and 'oksekød, hakket, 15-20% fedt' because it has the highest emission factor among the viable options, providing a conservative estimate.

For '3 store løg', the best match is 'løg'. This is the most direct and least processed form of onion available in the database, aligning with the principle of choosing the least processed option when no specific processing is mentioned for the ingredient. 'Løg, ristede' and 'løg, hakkede, dybfrost' are more processed, and 'rødløg' is a different type of onion.

For '3 gulerødder', the best match is 'gulerod'. This is the most direct and least processed form of carrot available. 'Gulerod, dybfrost' is a processed version, and 'grønkål' and 'rødkål' are different vegetables entirely.

For '2.5 stilke bladselleri', the best match is 'bladselleri'. This is an exact match for the ingredient and represents the raw, unprocessed form, which is appropriate as no processing is specified for the ingredient. The other options are either different types of celery or entirely different vegetables.

For '6 fed hvidløg', the best match is 'hvidløg'. This is the most direct and least processed form of garlic available in the database. 'Hvidløg i olie' and 'hvidløgsbaguette, frost' are processed products, and 'rødløg' is a different ingredient.

For '150 g tomatkoncentrat', the best match is 'tomatpure, koncentreret'. This is an exact match for the ingredient, as 'tomatkoncentrat' is synonymous with 'tomatpure, koncentreret'. This option accurately reflects the processed nature of the ingredient.

For '3 dåse hakkede tomater eller polpa', the best match is 'tomat, flået, konserves'. This option accurately reflects the canned and processed nature of 'hakkede tomater' (chopped tomatoes) or 'polpa'. 'Tomatpure, koncentreret' and 'tomat, soltørret' are different forms of processed tomatoes, and 'tun i tomat, konserves' is a final meal.
For '2 dl rødvin', the best match is 'rødvin'. This is an exact match for the ingredient. 'Rosévin' is a different type of wine, and 'rødkål' and 'rødløg' are entirely different ingredients.

For 'Olie', the best match is 'olivenolie'. When a generic ingredient like 'Olie' is provided, and multiple oil options are available, choosing the one with the highest emission factor among viable options is appropriate to provide a conservative estimate. All the oil options are viable, and 'olivenolie' has the highest emission factor.

For 'Friskekværnet peber', the best match is 'peber, sort'. This is the most common type of pepper used for grinding and is the least processed option among the pepper varieties. 'Peber, chili' is a different type of pepper, and 'peberfrugt' and 'marinerede grillede peberfrugter' are different ingredients.

For '1 håndfuld friske basilikumblade', the best match is 'basilikum, frisk'. This is an exact match for the ingredient, specifying 'friske' (fresh) basil leaves. 'Basilikum, tørret' is a processed form, and the other options are unrelated.

For 'Pasta efter ønske', the best match is 'pasta'. This is the most general and direct match for the ingredient. 'Fyldt frisk pasta' and 'frisk pasta, fettucine spinat' are more specific types of pasta, and 'pastasovs' is a sauce, not pasta itself.

For 'Revet parmesan', the best match is 'parmesan ost, 32+'. This is an exact match for the ingredient, as 'Revet parmesan' refers to grated parmesan cheese. 'Vegansk ost, revet eller skiver' is a different product, and the other options are unrelated.
